summary.Title: BMS Technician, Bulebel, Zejtun, Malta (413781)

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for an energetic and confident person to work as a BMS Technician.

Are you ambitious, with a passion for electronics and software? Is your dream job working for a fastgrowing and dynamic company, working in diverse technologies? Then look no further, we have just the right job for you!

Are you interested? Then read on….

Established over 30 years ago, AIS Technology provides high-quality engineering solutions including Building Automation, Security, HR solutions and IoT. The selected candidate will be involved in configuring, maintaining and troubleshooting BMS systems. It is particularly interesting to earnest and ambitious persons seeking to broaden their knowledge of building automation systems and enhance their careers.

What you will do:
Actively participate in BMS projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely delivery within budget and scope.
• Install, program and troubleshoot BMS-related hardware and software components based on predefined points lists, wiring diagrams and customer requirements
• Commissioning and testing BMS software and devices, on-site and remotely
• Periodic Preventive maintenance troubleshooting of BMS installations
• Design, assemble and test control panels, ensuring they are correctly wired, operational, and compliant with safety standards.
• Integrate BMS and REMS with IT infrastructure by configuring network settings and Industrystandard communication protocols like BACnet/IP and Modbus TCP/IP.

What do you need to succeed in this role:
• Higher Diploma (MQF level 5) in Industrial Automation, Electronics, Controls or equivalent
• Three years of work experience in a similar field;
• Familiarity with various BMS platforms (e.g., Honeywell, Siemens, Johnson Controls, Distech) and protocols like BACnet, Modbus and DALI.
• Good ICT skills, being comfortable working with applications such as MS Office and others
• Proficiency in reading and interpreting electrical schematics and wiring diagrams for control panels.
• Have good written and verbal skills in English. Fluency in Maltese is considered a plus.
• Hold a valid local driving licence
• Post may require on-call duties and out-of-office hours support.

Training provided

Training and coaching will be provided

Any assistance with accommodation/relocation

None

Any other benefits
• Welcoming, exciting and professional environment
• Competitive salary
• Performance bonuses based on KPIs
• Private Health Insurance
• Fully paid company vehicle
• Fully paid mobile line

Location

Bulebel, Zejtun, Malta

Salary

Eur 25,000 – 28,000

How will the interviews be held

online or in person.

To apply

CVs and a covering email are to be sent by email to eures.recruitment.jobsplus@gov.mt and should be written in English. Please quote the vacancy name BMS Technician and number 413781 in your email.

Latest application date is 20.02.2025

(from EURES Malta)
